data.title: Top 20 best hotels in Chalco de Diaz Covarrubias, Mexico, Estado de, Mexico
data.meta_description: Big Savings and low prices on Chalco de Diaz Covarrubias, Mexico, Estado de, Mexico.  Mexico, Estado de. Mexico hotels, motels, resorts and inns. Find best hotel deals and discounts. Book online now or call 24/7 toll-free.
data.text:
Free Wi-Fi, An On-Site Restaurant And 24-Hour Free Airport Shuttle Await Guests At The Doubletree By Hilton Mexico City Airport Area. Each Of The 96 Rooms At The Non-Smoking, Four-Story Doubletree Has Free Wi-Fi, A 42-Inch Flat-Panel Cable Hdtv And A Coffeemaker. You'Ll Find A Restaurant And Bar On-Site, As Well As A Business Center (Featuring Fax, Print And Photocopy Services). Active Guests Appreciate The Fitness Room. The 24-Hour Complimentary Shuttle Services The Airport And Area Destinations, Including Six Flags And Parque Tezontle Mall. Parking Is Free. The Doubletree Is A Five-Minute Drive From Parque Tezontle Mall. Autodromo Hermanos Rodriguez Is Five Miles Away, And The Sports Palace Is Six Miles Away. The National Museum Of Anthropology And Six Flags Mexico Are Both 15 Miles From The Property. Mexico City International Airport Is Nine Miles.

Read more

Hotel Abastos Plaza Is Located 10 Minutes’ Drive From Mexico City International Airport And It Offers Spa Facilities, Wi-Fi Access, A Restaurant And A Bar.The Modern-Style Rooms Offer Air Conditioning, A Desk, Flat-Screen Cable Tv, And A Lap Top Safe. The Private Bathroom Provides Toiletries And A Hairdryer. Views Of The City Can Be Enjoyed From All Rooms.The Restaurant Has Buffets And An À-La-Carte Service. Hotel Abastos Plaza Also Has Vending Machines With Drinks And Snacks. Room Service Is Available. Guests Can Explore The Restaurant Options Located In The Airport, Or Visit The Historic Centre Located 11 Km Away.Mexico City Offers Many Activities For Tourists. Guests Can Visit The Museum Area Featuring The National History Museum, The Anthropology Museum And The Palace Of The Fine Arts. This Zone Can Be Reached In A 20-Minute Drive, Or Guests Can Travel By Metro. Iztacalco Metro Station Is 15 Minutes’ Walk Away.

Read more

Property Location With a stay at Loove Hotel - Adults Only in Mexico City, you'll be within a 10-minute drive of Autodromo Hermanos Rodriguez and Sports Palace Dome. This romantic hotel is 6.5 mi (10.5 km) from Ayuntamiento (City Hall) and 6.7 mi (10.8 km) from Palacio Nacional. Rooms Stay in one of 23 guestrooms featuring flat-screen televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access is available to keep you connected. Bathrooms have showers and complimentary toiletries. Conveniences include blackout drapes/curtains, as well as phones with free local calls. Dining Take advantage of the hotel's 24-hour room service. Business, Other Amenities Free self parking is available onsite.

Read more

Offering A Restaurant, Fiesta Inn Plaza Central Aeropuerto Is Located Inside Plaza Central Shopping Mall, 3.6 Km From Palace Of Sports And From Foro Sol, Concert Venue. Free Wifi Access Is Available In All Rooms.Each Room Here Will Provide You With A Tv, Air Conditioning And Cable Channels. There Is Also A Coffee Machine. Featuring A Bath Or Shower, Private Bathroom Also Comes With A Hairdryer And Free Toiletries. You Can Enjoy City View And Garden View From The Room. Extras Include A Desk, A Safety Deposit Box And Ironing Facilities.At Fiesta Inn Plaza Central Aeropuerto You Will Find A 24-Hour Front Desk, A Garden And A Bar. Other Facilities Offered At The Property Include Meeting Facilities.The Hotel Is 10.5 Km From Mexico City Zocalo Square And 12 Km From The Fine Arts Museum. Benito Juárez International Airport Can Be Reached In About 12 Minutes By Car, While The Bus Station Is 20 Minutes' Drive Away.

Read more

Nh Aeropuerto T2 Mexico Is Conveniently Located At Terminal 2 Of Benito Juárez International Airport In Mexico City And Features A Spa And 24-Hour Room Service. This Three-Story Property Is Located Inside Terminal 2 At The Benito Juárez International Airport. It Has 287 Rooms And Features Modern Architecture And Decor Throughout. All Accommodations Have Hardwood Floors, Flat-Panel Tvs With Hbo, Contemporary Furnishings, Hairdryers And Ironing Facilities. Snacks Can Be Purchased From The Minibar. Order Room Service 24-Hours A Day Or Enjoy A Meal In The On-Site Restaurant. Before Your Next Flight, Squeeze In A Workout At The Fitness Center. Check In With The Office At The Business Center, Then Head To The Spa For A Massage Or Have A Drink In The Cocktail Lounge. The Concierge And Tour Desks Will Help You Make The Most Of Your Visit To Mexico City. Indoor Parking Is Available At The Airport. Nh Aeropuerto T2 Mexico Is Located In Terminal 2 At The Benito Juárez International Airport. Local Train And Bus Stations Are Within Walking Distance, Making It Easy To Explore Mexico City. The Paseo De La Reforma And The Historic Downtown District Are Both 15 Minutes Away. Guests Can Drive 20 Minutes To Visit Chapultepec, One Of The City'S Most Beautiful Parks. The National Museum Of Anthropology Is Also 20 Minutes From The Property.

Read more

Hotel Grand Prix Is Located Next To Palacio De Los Deportes And 15 Minutes' Walk From The Hermanos Rodriguez Nascar Racetrack. It Offers A Gym And A Free Shuttle To Benito Juarez International Airport, 4.5 Km Away.The Grand Prix’S Functional Modern Rooms Feature Free Wi-Fi, Air Conditioning And Satellite Tv. All Rooms Have A Safe And A Private Bathroom.Mexican And International Cuisine Is Served In The Monaco Bar-Restaurant, Open Every Day Until Midnight. You Can Also Order From The Room Service Menu.Hotel Grand Prix Is Just 600 Metres From The Shops Of Plaza Benito Juarez And 3 Km From Parque Tezontle Shopping Centre. Ciudad Deportiva Metro Station Is A 15-Minute Walk Away.

Read more

Free Wi-Fi, An On-Site Restaurant, Fitness Center And Well-Appointed Rooms Have Our Guests Feeling Great At The Non-Smoking Holiday Inn Hotel And Suites Ciudad De Mexico Medica Sur. The 53 Non-Smoking Rooms In This Two-Story Holiday Inn Come With Desks, In-Room Safes, Mini-Fridges, Coffee/Tea Makers, Flat-Panel Tvs And Dvd Players. Wi-Fi And Local Calls Are Free. Guests Can Keep Their Fitness Routines Going In The Hotel'S Fitness Room. The Restaurant Serves Breakfast, Lunch And Dinner, And Room Service Is Available. The Hotel Provides A Full-Service Business Center, Concierge Desk, Guest Laundromat, Valet Dry Cleaning And Valet Parking. Situated Within Mexico City'S Medica Sur Complex, The Hotel Is Surrounded By Businesses And Eateries. Take In A Game At Azteca Stadium, Home Of Mexico'S National Soccer Team And A 12-Minute Walk Away. Shoppers Can Indulge At Popular Nearby Malls Including The Gran Sur, Cuicuilco And Perisur, All Within Three Miles. The Famous Xochimilco Floating Gardens Are Also Three Miles Away, And Historic Downtown Tlalpan And The Tlalpan Cultural Center Are A Five Mile-Drive Away. Art Lovers Will Want To Visit Museo Diego Rivera, The Home Of Rivera And Frida Kahlo, 15 Minutes Away. It'S 20 Minutes To Downtown Mexico City, And Mexico City International Airport Is A Six-Mile Drive.

Read more

An On-Site Restaurant, Indoor Pool, Free Wi-Fi And Free Parking Are Just Some Of The Amenities That Make A Stay At Fiesta Inn Periferico Sur Convenient For Our Guests. This Contemporary 14-Story Hotel Offers 212 Rooms Overlooking The City. Each Room Comes With A Work Desk, In-Room Safe, Coffeemaker, Flat-Panel Tv And Free Wi-Fi. After A Good Night'S Sleep, Start Your Day With A Buffet Breakfast (For An Extra Charge) Or Order From The Menu At The On-Site Restaurant, Which Is Also Open For Lunch And Dinner. Room Service Is Available. For Leisure Time, Enjoy A Dip In The Indoor Pool Or Hit The Fitness Center For A Workout. Hotel Amenities Include A 24-Hour Front Desk, Business Center, Gift Shop, Guest Laundromat, Valet Laundry/Dry Cleaning And Free Parking. The Hotel Provides An Airport Shuttle For An Extra Fee. Located In The Southern Part Of Mexico City Between Insurgentes Sur And Calzada De Tlalpan Avenues, The Hotel Is Less Than Five Miles From Six Flags, Latin America'S Biggest Amusement Park. Enjoy One Of The City'S Top Shopping Centers At Perisur, Four Miles Away. Ciudad Universitaria Is Also Four Miles From The Hotel. Mexico City International Airport Is A 14-Mile Drive.

Read more

Complimentary Parking, Free Wi-Fi And Proximity To Local Attractions Make Holiday Inn Mexico Coyoacan Is An Enticing Option For Our Guests Headed To The Area. The Eight-Story Holiday Inn Features 214 Brightly Decorated Rooms Decked Out With Contemporary Furniture, Complimentary Wi-Fi, Individually Controlled Air Conditioning, Flat-Panel Cable Tvs, Coffeemakers And Work Desks. Select Accommodations Have Separate Living Areas With Sofa Beds. Room Service Is Available 24 Hours A Day. Guests Enjoy Mexican And International Cuisine Throughout The Day At The On-Site Restaurant. There'S Also An Inviting Lobby Bar That'S Just Right For After-Work Drinks. Corporate Guests Appreciate The 24-Hour Business Center. Other Amenities Include An Exercise Room, Currency Exchange, Concierge Services, A Guest Laundry, Gift Shop And Complimentary Parking. Valet Parking Is Available For An Added Fee. Located In The Pleasant Borough Of Coyoacan, This Holiday Inn Is Eight Minutes From Shops And Restaurants Around Plaza Hidalgo And Jardin Del Centenario. The Ermita Metro Station Is A Two-Minute Walk From The Property. The Zocalo And Mexico City Metropolitan Cathedral Are 12 Minutes Away. Benito Juarez International Airport Is Nine Miles From The Hotel.

Read more

An On-Site Restaurant And Lounge, Business And Fitness Centers And A Location Not Just Near — But In — The Airport Provide Convenience For Our Guests At The Hilton Mexico City Airport. Located On The Third Floor Of Terminal 1 Of Benito Juarez International Airport, The Hilton Has 129 Rooms Furnished With Signature Hilton Serenity Beds, Desks With Ergonomic Chairs, Coffeemakers And Flat-Panel Tvs With Premium Cable And Pay Movies. Rooms Also Include Clock Radios With Mp3 Connections, In-Room Safes, Two Dual-Line Phones And Free Wi-Fi. Non-Smoking Rooms Are Available. When It'S Time To Eat, Guests Check Out The Restaurant'S Offerings Or Sample The Lighter Menu In The Lobby Bar While They Watch Planes Depart Or Land On The Runways. Room Service Is Available. The Hotel Provides A Fitness Room, A Business Center, A Concierge Desk, A Gift Shop And A Newsstand. Parking Is Available In The Airport Parking Lot. The Hilton Is Approximately 20 Minutes From The Historic Center Of Mexico City, Chapultepec Park, The National Art Museum And The Frida Kahlo Museum. Aztec Stadium Is Less Than A Half-Hour Away, And Teotihuacan Archaeological Zone Is A 45-Minute Drive.

Read more

A Full-Service Restaurant, Free Airport Shuttle And Free Wi-Fi Are Among The Amenities At The Non-Smoking Courtyard Mexico City Airport, Where Our Guests Also Appreciate The Business And Fitness Centers. This Courtyard Has 288 Non-Smoking Rooms And Suites Occupying Five Floors. Accommodations Feature Desks And Ergonomic Chairs, Mini-Fridges And Coffeemakers. Amenities Also Include In-Room Safes, Radios With Ipod Docks, Flat-Panel Hdtvs With Free Premium Channels And Free Wi-Fi. The Hotel Helps You Stay Fit And Healthy With A Fitness Room. The On-Site Cafe Serves Breakfast For An Additional Charge And Is Open For Lunch And Dinner; And 24-Hour Room Service Is Available. Take Advantage Of Sunny Weather In The Open Courtyard And Atrium, Or Relax In The Lobby With A Free Newspaper And Cup Of Coffee. A Full-Service Business Center, Currency Exchange, Gift Shop And Valet Dry Cleaning Are Provided. Parking Is Available For An Additional Fee, And The Hotel Offers A Free Shuttle To The Airport. Connected By A Direct Walkway To Terminal 1 At Mexico City International Airport, The Hotel Offers A Free Shuttle To Terminal 2. The Historic Center Of Mexico City Is About 12 Minutes Away. El Angel, The Famous Angel Of Independence, Is Less Than 20 Minutes Away. Experience Grand Prix Racing At The Autódromo Hermanos Rodríguez Or A Sports Event Or Concert At Foro Sol, Both Within Four Miles. If You Have Time, Chapultepec Castle And Park, Where You Can Visit Chapultepec Zoo, The Museum Of Anthropology And The Fine Arts Museum, Are Well Worth The 18-Minute Drive.

Read more

Ideally Situated Opposite Terminal 1 Of Mexico City Airport, This Hotel Offers Luxurious Services And Comfortable Accommodation. It Is Connected To The Airport By A Footbridge And There Is An Exclusive Check-In Desk For Hotel Guests. Internet Access Is Available For Free.The Rooms Come With A Private Bathroom. Extras Include Free Toiletries And A Hairdryer. A Flat-Screen Tv Is Provided.Camino Real Features Services And Facilities To Make Visitors Feel Pampered. Get A New Look In The Beauty Salon, Then Relax With A Massage. Remain Active With The Fully Equipped Fitness Center, Complete With Steam Room, Indoor Pool And Personal Trainers.Mexico City'S Town Centre Is Just 8 Km From Camino Real Aeropuerto. Visit The Best Nearby Museums, Shopping, Restaurants And Historical Sites. The Exclusive Financial And Business District Of Polanco Is Also Just A 25-Minute Drive Away While The Hermanos Rodriguez Racetrack Is 7.3 Km Away.

Read more

Located In The South-East Area Of Mexico City, Hotel Kron Features A Restaurant On Site And Free Wifi Access. The Hotel Also Has A Business Centre And 24-Hour Front Desk Service.The Functional And Modern Rooms Include Cable Tv With A Dvd Player, Plus Air Conditioning. The Full Bathroom Provides Free Toiletries And A Hairdryer.Hotel Kron Is 1 Km From Parque Tezontle Shopping Mall, Where Department Stores, Shops And Movie Theatres Are Located. Also, A Variety Of Restaurants Can Be Found Here.The Mexico City International Airport Can Be Reached In A 20-Minute Drive, While The Historic Centre Is 25 Minutes’ Drive Away.

Read more

The Riazor Hotel Is A Different, Special Place, That Successfully Combines A Luxurious And Welcoming Ambiance Where You Will Find All The Comfort You Deserve. Free 24-Hour Airport Shuttle Is Available.All Rooms Feature A Flat-Screen Tv, Private Bathroom With Hair Dryer And Air Conditioning. All Rooms Have A Telephone And Ironing Facilities.Riazor Hotel Offers A Spa Zone, Which Includes A Heated Pool, Hot Tub And Sauna. There Is Also A Conferences Room For Up To 500 Persons.The Hotel'S Rias Bajas Restaurant Offers Guests An Authentic Taste Of Mexico, With A Variety Of Regional And International Dishes. Bicos Cafe Features Snacks, International Cocktails And Coffee.

Read more

Expect Easy Access Via Shuttle To The Airport, Covered Parking, A Fitness Center And On-Site Dining At The Non-Smoking Holiday Inn Mexico Dali Airport. The Five-Floor, Non-Smoking Holiday Inn Greets Guests With A Soaring Atrium Lobby Featuring Colorful, Modern Furniture. All 150 Rooms Have Triple-Sheeted Beds, Free Wi-Fi, Individually Controlled Air Conditioning, Flat-Panel Tvs With Hbo, Work Desks, Coffeemakers, Seating Areas And Voicemail Phones. The In-House Restaurant Serves Mexican And International Cuisine At Breakfast, Lunch, Dinner And 24-Hour Room Service. A Lounge Offers Live Music Most Evenings. Relaxation Is Easy Here, Thanks To The Fitness Center, Sauna And Outdoor Patio With Hot Tub. Other Amenities Include A Concierge, Currency Exchange, Business Center, Child Care, Complimentary Covered Parking And An Airport Shuttle. Adjacent To Viaducto Piedad, The Holiday Inn Is Seven Minutes From The Sports Palace Dome, Foro Sol Stadium And Hermanos Rodriguez Race Track. The Zocalo, National Palace And Mexico City Metropolitan Cathedral Are Eight Minutes Away. Benito Juarez International Airport Is Seven Miles From The Hotel.

Read more

Set In One Of The Most Traditional And Representative Neighborhoods In Mexico City, Hostal La Encantada Is Located In The Heart Of Coyoacán. The Property Offers Free Wifi Access.The Comfortable And Functional Rooms Will Offer The Guests A Wardrobe, Clothes Rack And Garden Views. The Full Bathrooms Include A Shower And Free Toiletries, Plus They Are Shared.At Hostal La Encantada You Will Find A Garden, A Terrace And A Shared Kitchen. Other Facilities Offered At The Property Include A Shared Lounge And Dry Cleaning. The Property Offers Free Parking.Coyoacán Is A Colonial-Style District That Offers A Wide Variety Of Cultural Activities. Guests Can Visit Frida Kahlo’S Blue House, The Artist’S Home And Shop Turned Into A Museum Which Is 5 Minutes’ Walk Away. Coyoacán’S Main Square And Colonial Cathedral Are Located 10 Minutes’ Walk Away. The Viveros De Coyoacán, A Popular Jogging Park, Is 1 Km Away.

Read more

On The South Side Of Mexico City, Close To Perisur Shopping Mall, Radisson Paraiso Mexico City Impresses Our Guests With Amenities And Convenience. This 237-Room Hotel On 10 Floors Offers Free, High-Speed Internet Access In All Rooms, Along With Work Desks, Minibars, Cable Tv With In-Room Movies And Free Newspapers Every Morning. The Hotel Has Four Dining Options, Including A Buffet Restaurant And Classic Mexican. The Bar In The Atrium-Style Lobby Is A Great Place To Meet Fellow Travelers Or Sit And People Watch. The Hotel Also Offers A Full Business Center With Secretarial Services, A 24-Hour Front Desk, Car Rental, A Gift Shop And An On-Site Fitness Center. Outside Parking Is Free At This Hotel, And Indoor Parking Is Available For A Fee. The Hotel Is Close To The City'S Business District, And Perisur Shopping Mall Is Less Than A Mile Away. Six Flags Mexico City Is Two-And-A-Half Miles From The Hotel. Mexico'S Main Tourist Area, The Zona Rosa, Is 20 Minutes, And Mexico City International Airport Is 18 Miles.

Read more

Offering Outdoor Pool And Extensive Gardens In A Hacienda-Style Building, La Mansión Del Quijote Is Located In Texcoco De Mora. The Property Has A Restaurant And Wi-Fi Access Available.The Colonial-Style Rooms Will Provide You With Cable Tv, A Seating Area And Some Units Have A Sofa. Featuring A Shower, Private Bathrooms Also Come With Towels.The Friendly Staff At La Mansión Del Quijote Will Be Available At The Front Desk 24 Hours A Day. Other Facilities Offered In The Property Include Shared Lounge, A Children'S Playground And A Laundry.Texcoco’S Town Centre Can Be Reached In A 10-Minute Drive; In The Town Centre Is Located The Bus Station. Gran Plaza Texcoco Is 1 Km Away. The Property Offers Free Parking.

Read more

Expect Free Wi-Fi, On-Site Dining, A Fitness Center And Business Services At The Non-Smoking Holiday Inn Mexico City - Plaza Universidad, A Popular Choice Among Our Guests. The Four-Floor Holiday Inn'S 148 Rooms Are Furnished With Sleek, Modern Furniture And Bright Colors. All Accommodations Feature Complimentary Wi-Fi, Cable Tvs With Nintendo Game Systems, Coffeemakers, Work Desks And Voicemail Phones. Select Units Have Separate Living Areas, Dvd Players And Kitchenettes. Room Service Is Available, And There'S On-Site Restaurant That Serves International Cuisine Throughout The Day. If You'D Like To Relax With A Cocktail Before Dinner, Head To The Sophisticated Lobby Bar. The Hotel'S Staffed Business Center And Meeting Facilities Are A Big Plus For Work Travelers. Other Amenities Include A Fitness Center, Concierge Desk, Car Rental Services And Valet Parking (Extra Fees Apply). The Holiday Inn Is Located On Plaza Universidad Square, A Five-Minute Walk From The Zapata Metro Station. Sporting Events Are Found Three Miles Away At The Plaza Mexico Bullring And Estadio Azul. The Zocalo And The National Palace Are Eight Miles. Benito Juarez International Airport Is 10 Miles From The Hotel.

Read more

Property Location With a stay at Hostel & Hotel La Selva in Mexico City (Cuauhtemoc), you'll be within a 5-minute drive of Ayuntamiento (City Hall) and Palacio Nacional. This hotel is 2.1 mi (3.4 km) from Plaza de la Constitucion and 2.1 mi (3.4 km) from Zocalo. Rooms Make yourself at home in one of the 33 guestrooms. Complimentary wireless Internet access is available to keep you connected. Bathrooms with showers are provided. Amenities Make use of convenient amenities, which include complimentary wireless Internet access and tour/ticket assistance. Guests can catch a ride to nearby destinations on the area shuttle (surcharge). Dining Satisfy your appetite at the hotel's coffee shop/café, or stay in and take advantage of the 24-hour room service. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at the bar/lounge. Full breakfasts are available daily from 7:30 AM to 10:30 AM for a fee. Business, Other Amenities Featured amenities include a 24-hour front desk, luggage storage, and laundry facilities. A shuttle from the airport to the hotel is provided for a surcharge (available 24 hours), and self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.

Read more

Offering A Fitness Centre And Free Breakfast, City Express Plus Patio Universidad Is Located 500 Metres From Plaza Universidad Mall And 1.5 Km From Parque De Los Venados Park.The Rooms Here Will Provide You With A Flat-Screen Tv, Air Conditioning And Cable Channels. Private Bathrooms Also Come With A Shower. Extras Include A Desk And Free Wi-Fi Connection Is Available Throughout The Property.At City Express Plus Patio Universidad You Will Find A 24-Hour Front Desk. Other Facilities Offered Include Luggage Storage, Business Facilities, Dry Cleaning And A Laundry.The Hotel Is 10 Km From Palace Of Sports, 7.5 Km From Us Embassy And 7.7 Km From Main Tower. Benito Juárez International Airport Is 13.5 Km Away. The Property Offers Parking At An Extra Cost.

Read more

Featuring Free Wifi Connection Throughout The Property And A Beautiful Garden, Hotel Centro Diana Is Located Just 15 Minutes’ Walk From From Unam National Autonomous University.The Rooms At Hotel Centro Diana Offer A Simple Decoration And Views Of The Garden. All Come With A Bathroom And A Shower.Other Facilities Offered Are A 24-Hour Front Desk, Luggage Storage And Free Parking. Guests Can Also Find A Variety Of Restaurants Within 200 Metres.The Hotel Is Just 3.4 Km From Frida Kahlo House Museum And 15 Minutes’ Drive From Coyoacán Square And The Culturas Populares National Museum. Six Flags Mexico Is 9 Km Away And Mexico City International Airport Is 19 Km Away.

Read more

Within Driving Distance Of The World Trade Center, This Mexico City Hotel Features Modern Amenities And Many Thoughtful On-Site Facilities, Including A Business Center, An Outdoor Pool And An Indoor Pool Only For Adults.Guests Staying At The Royal Pedregal Hotel Are Provided With A Number Of Modern Amenities, Including Wireless Internet Access, In-Room And Coffeemakers. The Hotel Also Features An On-Site Barbershop. 24 Hours A Day Room Service.With On-Site Concierge Services, Guests At The Pedregal Royal Can Easily Arrange Tours, Excursions And Trips In The Surrounding Area. Downtown Mexico City Is Also Nearby And Offers An Exciting Nightlife, Local Restaurants And Shopping Centers.The Royal Pedregal Also Offers On-Site Breakfast, Lunch And Dinner A Day At The Primavera Restaurant. Also On-Site Is Tezka Restaurant Featuring Basque Cuisine For Lunch And Dinner.

Read more

Rústika Spa Hotel Boutique Is Located In Tepoztlán, Morelos. This Contemporary Rustic Property Features An Outdoor Pool, Free Wifi Access And An On-Site Restaurant.The Suites Are Bright And Decorated With Light Colours And Wooden Details. Each One Has A Flat-Screen Cable Tv, Seating Area And A Private Bathroom That Includes Toiletries.Guests Will Also Have The Option To Roam Around Tepoztlán’S Town Centre And Visit The Local Market, Where Art Crafts, Souvenirs And Snacks Are Sold.Rústica Spa Offers A Variety Of Massages And Treatments For A Fee. The Property Also Has A Shared Lounge, Tour Desk And 24-Hour Front Desk Service.Cuernavaca Can Be Reached In A 25-Minute Drive, While The Hotel Is 1 Hour And 20 Minutes’ Drive From Mexico City.

Read more

Offering A Restaurant With Local Food, A Garden And Terrace, Posada Del Valle Is Located 2.5 Km From Tepoztlán Main Square. Free Wifi Access Is Available In Public Areas Such As The Lobby.Featuring A Shower, The Private Bathroom Also Comes With Free Toiletries. You Can Enjoy Mountain View And Garden View From The Room. Extras Include A Safety Deposit Box And A Fan.At Posada Del Valle You Will Find A 24-Hour Front Desk And Free Parking. Other Facilities Offered At The Property Include A Shared Lounge, A Tour Desk And Luggage Storage.This Property Is 8.5 Km From El Tepozteco Mountain And 25 Km From Cuernavaca Town Centre. Mexico City International Airport Is 90-Minute Drive Away.

Read more

Amid Mexico City’S Historic Centre, And Only 3 Minutes’ Walk From The Zócalo Square, This Hostel Offers Free Wi-Fi Connection Throughout The Entire Property. The Common Use Terrace Offers Panoramic Views Of The City.Featuring A Colourful Décor, The Accommodations At Hotel Amigo Zocalo Have Cable Tv And Safety Deposit Boxes. The Bathrooms Have Free Toiletries And Showers.Guests Will Be Able To Find Food And Restaurant Options Within 1 Km Radius, Where Mexican, International And Local Dishes Are On Disposition.The Metropolitan Cathedral Is 260 Metres From Hotel Amigo Zocalo, Palacio Nacional Federal Government Building Can Be Reached In 3 Minutes By Foot. The Subway Station Is Also Located In The Zócalo Square And The Fine Art Palace And Museum Is 1 Km Away.

Read more

Free Hot Breakfast, On-Site Dining And Free High-Speed Internet In A Magnificent Spanish Colonial Building Blend The Best Of Past And Present At Hampton Inn And Suites Mexico City. The Six-Floor Hotel'S 108 Rooms And Suites Feature Signature Hampton Bedding And Flat-Panel Lcd Tvs With Pay Movies. Am/Fm Clock Radios With Mp3 Connections, Work Desks With Ergonomic Chairs And Coffee/Tea Makers Add Convenience To Comfort. Some Rooms Have Sofa Beds And You Can Web Surf For Free In All Rooms. Non-Smoking Rooms Are Available. Breakfast Is On The House With The Hampton'S Free Signature Buffet. Guests In A Hurry Are Invited To Grab A Free Continental Breakfast-To-Go. Dining Options Include A Restaurant, Cocktail Lounge And Bakery/Cafe. For Recreation, Head To The Fitness Room, Relax On The Rooftop Terrace Or Find A Comfy Chair In The Hotel'S Six-Floor Atrium Lobby And Gaze At The Stained Glass Ceiling. A Staffed Business Center, Concierge Desk, Guest Laundromat, Valet Dry Cleaning And Parking (For An Extra Fee) Are Provided On-Site. Located In Mexico City'S Centro Historico District, The Hotel Is Within A Five-Minute Walk Of The National Palace And The Templo Mayor Aztec Ruins. Alameda Park And The Palace Of Fine Arts Are Seven Blocks Away. The U.S. Embassy Is Two Miles Away. Chapultepec Park, Home To Chapultepec Castle, Several Museums, A Zoo And Playground, Is Three Miles From The Hotel. Mexico City International Airport Is A Seven-Mile Drive Away.

Read more

The Stylish Hotel Lord In Mexico City’S Doctores Neighborhood Offers Guests Free Wi-Fi, Private Parking And Room Service.The Spacious Rooms At This Hotel Come With Cable Tv, A Sofa And A Wardrobe. They Also Feature A Table With Chairs And A Private Bathroom With A Shower And Free Toiletries.The Hotel'S Restaurant Features A Menu With A Variety Of Local Dishes.The Stylish Roma Neighborhood, Where Guests Can Find Shopping And Night Life, Is Just 3.5 Km From The Hotel.There Is A Metro Station Within 600 Metres Of The Property, And Benito Juarez International Airport Is A 20-Minute Drive.

Read more

In The Heart Of Mexico City, Just 10 Minutes’ Walk From The Historic Centre And The Metropolitan Cathedral, Hotel Templo Mayor Is Housed In A Historic Building Of The 18Th Century. It Offers Free Wi-Fi Access And On-Site Shops.The Rooms Are Decorated With Hand-Painted Talavera Tiles, Cable Tv And A Bathroom That Features A Rain Shower. The Decoration Of The Property Includes Mexican Art Crafts.Hotel Templo Mayor Also Has A Bar That Serves Drinks And Snacks. San Francisco Restaurant Is Specialized In Typical Cuisine From Tlaxcala And It Is Located 150 Metres Away. Guests At This Property Can Get A Special Price In This Restaurant.The Hotel Has A Central Patio, Elevator And Safety Boxes In The Front Desk. The Antiguo Colegio De San Ildefonso Museum Is Right Next To The Property.Hotel Templo Mayor Features A Privileged Location And Is 300 Metres From The Metrobus Station, 600 Metres From Zócalo Metro Station And 8 Minutes’ Walk From The Turibus Station.

Read more

The Landmark Mexico City Hotel, Overlooking The Famous Zocalo Square, The Non-Smoking Gran Hotel Ciudad De Mexico Treats Our Guests To Mexican Haute Cuisine, A Lobby Piano Bar And Rooms With Flat-Panel Tvs. Opened In 1899 And Extensively Refurbished In 2005, The Four-Floor Gran Hotel Is Considered The Quintessential Landmark Hotel Of Mexico City. It Features Art Nouveau Architecture And A Belle Epoque Lobby With A Stained-Glass Dome, Chandeliers, Gilded Birdcages And Wrought-Iron Elevators. The 60 Rooms Are Decorated In Classical Style And Include Minibars, Coffee/Tea Makers, Wi-Fi (For A Fee) And Flat-Panel Lcd Tvs With Satellite Channels. Work Out In The 24-Hour Fitness Center And Chat Up The Concierge For Tourist Tips. The Hotel Also Has A Business Center, Adjacent Parking (For A Fee), International Cafe, Lobby Piano Bar And Terrace Restaurant And Bar With Zocalo Views. The Gran Hotel Is In The Centro Overlooking The Famous Zocalo, Next To Templo Mayor. Mexico City International Airport Is Seven Miles East.

Read more

Freebies Include Wi-Fi And Parking At The Non-Smoking Fiesta Inn Insurgentes Sur, Where There'S Also A Restaurant And Room Service. The Mid-Rise, Non-Smoking Fiesta Inn Is Home To 162 Modern Rooms That Boast Free Wi-Fi And Flat-Panel Tvs. The Fitness Room And Business Center Keep Guests On Task. When Hunger Hits, Guests Head To The In-House Restaurant Or Dial Up 24-Hour Room Service. There'S Also A Bar On-Site. Handy Services Include A 24-Hour Front Desk, Laundry And Free Parking. About 20 Minutes From Central Mexico City, The Fiesta Inn Is Off Highway 85 And Within A Half-Mile Of Several Restaurants And Shops. Within 20 Minutes Of The Hotel, Guests Wander The Grand Chapultepec Castle, Explore The National Museum Of Anthropology And Check Out The Stunning Architecture At Palacio De Bellas Artes. Other Points Of Interest Include The Ruins At Museo Del Templo Mayor, A 25-Minute Drive, And The Frida Kahlo Museum, Two Miles Away. Guest Walk A Half-Block To The Bus Stop And A Half-Mile To The Metro Station. Mexico City International Airport Is 11 Miles Away.

The Shared Bathrooms Are Bright And Modern.Hostal Amigo’S Lively Bar Is An Ideal Place To Meet Other Guests. You Can Also Use The Free Computer Room. The Multilingual Staff At Reception Are Happy To Arrange City Tours And Excursions, And Transport To Mexico City Airport Can Be Organized At An Extra Cost.

Rooms With Cable Tv And On-Site Dining Are Popular Perks With Our Guests, Who Find Themselves Surrounded By Museums, Monuments, Galleries And Historic Architecture When They Stay At Nh Centro Historico. The Hotel Offers 105 Non-Smoking Rooms, Most With Spectacular City Views Spread Over Five Floors. All Accommodations Feature Cable Tv, Clock Radios, Multi-Line Phones, Desks, Laptop Safes And Easy Chairs For Relaxing. The Restaurant Serves International And Modern Mexican Cuisine For Lunch And Dinner As Well As A Breakfast Buffet Each Morning. The Terrace Is The Perfect Place For A Drink With Friends In Good Weather, And The Lobby Bar Offers A Cozy Setting As Well. Room Service Is Available 24/7. A Fitness Room, 24-Hour Front Desk, Concierge Desk, Business Center, Currency Exchange And Valet Dry Cleaning Are Provided. Parking Is Available For An Additional Charge. Located Two Blocks From Metropolitan Cathedral And Constitution Plaza In The Heart Of Mexico City, The Hotel Is Close To Museums And Historic Monuments. Alameda Central Is Approximately Eight Blocks Away, And The Palace Of Fine Arts Is A 10-Minute Walk. Templo Mayor Aztec Ruins Are Seven Minutes Away On Foot. Chapultepec Park, Home To Chapultepec Castle, Several Museums, A Zoo And A Playground, Is Four Miles From The Hotel. It'S Eight Miles To Mexico City Airport.

Free Wi-Fi, A Rooftop Restaurant And Proximity To The City'S Prime Attractions Are Highlights At The Best Western Majestic In Mexico City. The Best Western Is Home To 84 Rooms Spread Across Seven Stories. All Rooms Feature Free Wi-Fi, Cable Tv And Coffeemakers. There Are 17 Non-Smoking Rooms. Refreshment Comes In The Form Of A Cocktail Lounge And Rooftop Restaurant, Where You'Ll Find International Cuisine And Sweeping Views Of The Zocalo. Ask At The 24-Hour Front Desk For Help With Fax And Photocopy Services. Transportation To The Airport Is Available For A Fee. Located In The Zocalo, One Of The Most Historic Public Plazas In The World, The Best Western Faces The National Palace. The Hotel Also Faces The Metropolitan Cathedral, Which Is A Three-Minute Walk Away. Aztec Temples Are Two Blocks From The Property, And Mexico City'S Polanco Neighborhood Is 10 Miles Away. Mexico City International Airport Is Eight Miles.

Business And Fitness Centers, On-Site Dining, Free Parking And A Helpful Concierge Are Popular Perks At The Holiday Inn Mexico Zocalo. The Five-Story Hotel Has 105 Non-Smoking Rooms That Offer Desks, Coffee/Tea Makers, Wi-Fi And Cable Tv. Suites Also Have Sofa Beds. The Hotel Features A Business Center, Fitness Room And Sauna. Guests Can Enjoy Meals At The On-Site Restaurant, Which Serves Breakfast, Lunch And Dinner. Dining On The Outdoor Terrace Overlooking The Main Square Is A Special Treat When Weather Permits. Room Service Is Also Available. Additional Amenities Include Concierge Services, A Guest Laundromat, Valet Dry Cleaning And Free Parking. Located In Downtown Mexico City, The Hotel Occupies The Site Where Moctezuma'S Palace Once Stood. The National Cathedral Is Next Door. Take Advantage Of Bikes Provided By The Hotel At No Charge To Explore The Area, Or Ask The Concierge For Assistance In Arranging Tours Of The City. The Concierge Can Also Get Discounted Tickets For Six Flags Amusement Park, 25 Minutes Away, And To Nearby Theaters. The National Palace And The Templo Mayor Aztec Ruins Are Within A Five-Minute Walk, And The Bellas Artes Museum Is Eight Blocks Away. Take Time To Explore The Museum Of Modern Art With Works By Frida Kahlo And Diego Riviera, Five Miles Away. Mexico City Airport Is A Seven-Mile Drive.
